#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;

main()
{
 int t,n,i,j,num,hn,hc,count;
 scanf("%d",&t);
 while(t--)
 {
  
  scanf("%d",&n);
  int a[100];
  i=0;count=0;hn=0;hc=0;
   while(i<n)
   {
     scanf("%d",&num);
     a[i++]=num;
   }
  
  for(i=1;i<=10000;i++)
   {
    count=0;
    for(j=0;j<n;j++)
     { 
       if(a[j]==i)
          count++;
     }
    if(count>hc)
      {
        hc=count;
        hn=i;
        
      }
   }
 printf("%d %d\n",hn,hc);
 }
}
